about.title: Xay dung cho giao duc Viet Nam
about.subtitle: FrogEdu duoc thiet ke rieng cho tieu hoc Viet Nam (Lop 1-5), ket hop cong nghe AI tien tien voi phuong phap giao duc da duoc kiem chung de tao nen nen tang truc quan ma giao vien va hoc sinh yeu thich.

cta.title: San sang chuyen doi lop hoc cua ban?
cta.subtitle: Tham gia cung giao vien tren khap Viet Nam su dung FrogEdu de tao bai danh gia thong minh hon va nang cao viec hoc cua hoc sinh

faq.title: Cau hoi thuong gap
faq.subtitle: Giai dap cac thac mac pho bien ve FrogEdu

q1.question: Trinh tao de thi thong minh hoat dong nhu the nao?
q1.answer: Trinh tao de thi thong minh su dung AI de phan tich ma tran de (phan bo do kho va pham vi chu de) va tu dong chon cau hoi tu ngan hang cau hoi rong lon. Ban luon co the chinh thu cong neu can.

q2.question: FrogEdu phu hop voi tat ca khoi lop khong?
q2.answer: Co! FrogEdu bao phu giao duc tieu hoc Viet Nam lop 1-5. Moi lop co noi dung va muc do kho phu hop voi tieu chuan chuong trinh.

q3.question: Toi co the xuat de thi o cac dinh dang khac nhau khong?
q3.answer: Hien tai, chung toi ho tro xuat PDF va DOCX. Tat ca tep duoc luu an toan tren AWS S3 va cung cap qua URL ky so de truy cap an toan.

q4.question: Gia su AI giup hoc sinh nhu the nao?
q4.answer: Gia su AI su dung phuong phap Socrates de huong dan hoc sinh giai bai ma khong tra loi truc tiep. Gia su tham chieu noi dung sach giao khoa lien quan va luu lich su hoi thoai de giao vien xem lai.

q5.question: Co ban dung thu mien phi khong?
q5.answer: Co! Chung toi co ban dung thu mien phi de ban trai nghiem tat ca tinh nang. Khong can the tin dung de bat dau. Dang ky ngay de bat dau chuyen doi lop hoc.

newsletter.title: Cap nhat moi
newsletter.subtitle: Dang ky nhan ban tin de nhan meo, cap nhat va tai nguyen doc quyen cho giao vien

footer.copyright: © 2026 FrogEdu. Tat ca quyen duoc bao luu.

hero.subtitle: FrogEdu la nen tang giao duc tien phong ho tro boi AI, duoc thiet ke rieng cho giao duc tieu hoc Viet Nam, ket hop cong nghe hien dai voi su xuat sac ve su pham.

mission.title: Su menh cua chung toi
mission.paragraph_one: Chung toi tin rang moi dua tre deu xung dang co co hoi tiep can giao duc chat luong. Su menh cua chung toi la dan chu hoa viec hoc bang cach cung cap cho giao vien va hoc sinh cac cong cu AI manh me, giup hoc tap hap dan, ca nhan hoa va hieu qua hon.
mission.paragraph_two: Tap trung vao chuong trinh giao duc tieu hoc Viet Nam (Lop 1-5), chung toi dam bao nen tang phu hop voi tieu chuan quoc gia trong khi tich hop cac phuong phap giang day doi moi.
